title.rendered: Kulm Artisan Fire Bowl Featured in Kitchen and Bath Business

content.rendered:
The October issue of Kitchen and Bath Business highlights the Kulm Artisan Fire Bowl in the “What’s Cool…Everywhere Else” section. Also included is an image of the Kulm Fire Bowl in Aged Teak with a Honed finish.

The editor writes, “The Kulm Artisan Fire Bowls from Eldorado Stone were designed to enrich outdoor living areas. They are available in four colors—black sand, oak barrel, aged teak and oyster shell—and in 40- and 60-in. sizes. They feature high-performance brass burners for an elevated appearance and extended burning time and are hand packed into molds and hand sanded to give each piece a unique look and feel.”
